medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain unremitting since 10AM this morning.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has experienced intermittent right upper quadrant (RUQ) and epigastric pain associated with nausea and vomiting since her laparoscopic cholecystectomy. The pain became unremitting today starting at 10AM, prompting her to seek medical care. She is unable to tolerate oral intake except for a few Cheerios and has noted loose stools.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Stage III invasive ductal carcinoma HER 2+ BRCA 1+, GERD, migraine, psoriasis, depression, gallstones.
